com.dor.coupons.system.dbdao

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dor.coupons.system.dbdao.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    @Component
 @Scope(value="singleton")
public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO

    This CompanyDBDAO class implements CompanyDAO interface,

    and override all the methods for reading and writing to the Company table in the database.

    This class use the companyRepo class to write and read and write to the database.

    All the methods that want to communicate with the database, get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dor aharon

        Throws:

      • getCouponById

        public Coupon getCouponById(long couponId)

        Use the companyRepo class to get coupon by a given id.

        The coupon belongs to the last company that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Parameters:
        couponId - Id of the requested coupon.
        Returns:
        Coupon object with the requested coupon id of the last company that successfully logged in.

      • getCouponsByType

        The coupons belong to the last company that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Returns:

      • getCouponsByTopPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByTopPrice(double price)

        The coupons belong to the last company that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Parameters:
        price - The maximum price (of the coupon) you want to get.
        Returns:

      • getCouponsByEndDate

        The coupons belong to the last company that successfully logged in.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Parameters:
        endDate - The last day of availability selected for coupons.
        Returns:
        Collection of coupons objects whose end date is before and same with given coupon end date.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String companyName,
                     java.lang.String password)

        Checks if company exists in database by name and compares given password to the one in the database.

        Use the companyRepo class to check if there is a company with the same given name and password in the database.

        This method get a Synchronize from the Synchronize pool and return it when finished.

        Specified by:
        login in interface CompanyDAO
        Parameters:
        companyName - Given company name String for login.
        password - Given company password String for login.
        Returns:
        Boolean of login success.
